nodes.text: The Myrkr system contained the planet of Myrkr and the cognominal star.

During Thrawn campaign, Grand Admiral Thrawn returned to Myrkr after the Battle of Sluis Van in retaliation for the Rescue on Myrkr. He guessed the presence of the Wild Karrde in the system and tried to intercept it with the Immobilizer 418 cruiser Constrainer but the smugglers were able to escape thanks to Mara Jade who felt the Imperial attack.
